body:
Hi all, I'm getting 0 KWhr for 'totalSolarGain' internally out of 'runEnergySimulation/readEPResult' for a very simple model with one zone. I have large windows facing north (Australia, so heat gains should be there). Tried all I can think of e.g. changing window material/construction types etc. I've got an EPMaterial with UV/SHGC/VT input to SetEPZone and childSurfaces input to HBSurfaces further down the line. I'm doing something wrong, so any ideas out there?

Kind regards,

Rob
